section.title: Description
section.para: The <rich:scrollableDataTable> component is used for the table-like component creation. The component just adds the set of additional features described below in comparison with the standard table.

itemizedlist.listitem: Variable content of the table cells
Dynamically fetching the rows from the server when the table is scrolled up and down
Resizing columns by mouse dragging the column bar
Sorting column by clicking the header
Fixed one or more left columns when table is scrolled horizontally
